content: <1>{{displayName}}</1> invites you to join the room <1>{{roomName}}</1> for secure document collaboration.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a notification message that invites a user to join a secure collaboration room. It appears in a greeting component when a new user joins or creates an account, and it includes placeholders for the user's display name and the room's title. The purpose of this text is to inform the user about the invitation to collaborate on documents securely.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation uses spaces before and after the <1> tags. This deviates from the English source and should be consistent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the spaces before and after the <1> tags: <1>{{displayName}}</1> becomes <1>{{displayName}}</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'secure document collaboration' is not accurately conveyed. 'Təhlükəsiz sənəd əməkdaşlığı' translates literally to 'safe document collaboration,' which isn't as strong as 'secure document collaboration' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a phrase like 'məxususi sənəd işləməsi' (confidential document work) or 'qorunan sənəd işləməsi' (protected document work) to better convey the meaning of 'secure document collaboration'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. It's more natural to say "[displayName] invites you to join the room [roomName] for..." rather than "[displayName] invites you to join *the room to* [roomName] for..."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <1>{{displayName}}</1>-ը հրավիրում է ձեզ միանալ <1>{{roomName}}</1> սենյակին՝ փաստաթղթերի անվտանգ համագործակցության համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word order could be improved for better flow. It's less common to place 'սենյակին' after the room name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <1>{{displayName}}</1>-ը հրավիրում է ձեզ միանալ <1>{{roomName}}</1>-ին՝ փաստաթղթերի անվտանգ համագործակցության համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'secure document collaboration' is not accurately translated. 'Collaboration sicura sui documenti' is a bit awkward. A more natural translation would be 'collaborazione sicura di documenti' or 'collaborazione sicura su documenti'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ti invita a unirti alla stanza <1>{{roomName}}</1> per una collaborazione sicura di documenti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "安全なドキュメント共同作業をするように" is a bit clunky and overly literal. A more natural way to convey "secure document collaboration" would be something like "安全なドキュメント共有" or "安全な共同作業".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 安全なドキュメント共有をするように

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of `<1>` tags is inconsistent with typical Japanese sentence structure and doesn't align with common practices. It's not necessary and makes the Japanese reading strange.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the `<1>` tags. The translation should be: {{displayName}}さんは、安全なドキュメント共有をするように、あなたをルーム {{roomName}}に招待しています。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "invites you to join the room" is translated as "귀하를 ... 방에 초대했습니다". While technically correct, it's a bit formal and stiff for typical user communication. A more natural translation would be something like "... 방에 참여해 주세요" or "... 방에 오세요".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating "invites you to join the room" as "... 방에 참여해 주세요" or "... 방에 오세요".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation lacks the use of the Korean honorific particle '님' after the room name, which is common practice when referring to a room.  It is appropriate to add 님 after 방.

The phrase 'ආරාධනා කර ඇත' (aaradhanaa karaa geta) translates to 'has invited'. A more natural and active phrasing for an invitation in Sinhala would be 'ඔබවයි ආරාධනා කරයි' (obaa-yai aaradhanaa karayae) which means 'invites you'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <1>{{displayName}}</1> ඔබට ආරක්‍ෂිතව සහයෝගයෙන් ලේඛන වල වැඩ කිරීමට <1>{{roomName}}</1> කාමරයට <1>{{displayName}}</1> ඔබවයි ආරාධනා කරයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ඔබවයි ආරාධනා කරයි' needs to be placed within the same <1> tags as the other text. Adding it this way avoids disjointed sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <1>{{displayName}}</1> ඔබට ආරක්‍ෂිතව සහයෝගයෙන් ලේඛන වල වැඩ කිරීමට <1>{{roomName}}</1> කාමරයට <1>{{displayName}}</1> ඔබවයි ආරාධනා කරයි</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'приступите' (pristupite) which translates to 'access' or 'approach' doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'join' in this context. A more accurate translation for 'join' would be 'уђете' (uđete).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <1>{{displayName}}</1> вас позива да уђете соби <1>{{roomName}}</1> за сигурну документ сарадњу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'join the room' is not perfectly translated. 'pristupite sobi' translates to 'access the room' which is not equivalent to 'join the room'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: vas poziva da se pridružite sobi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation 'davet ediyor' (invites) is slightly too formal for a typical invitation in this context. A more natural phrasing would be 'diyor' (says) or 'bekliyor' (welcomes).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <1>{{displayName}}</1> sizi güvenli belge iş birliği için <1>{{roomName}}</1> odasına katılmaya <1>{{roomName}}</1> diyor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content has <1>...</1> tags around the variables.  The Turkish translation also uses this, but the variables are inside the same tags.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent formatting.  The most natural way would be to mirror the English tag structure: <1>{{displayName}}</1> <1>{{roomName}}</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The space after the opening tag <1> in the Vietnamese translation is unnecessary. It should match the English formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <1>{{displayName}}</1> mời bạn tham gia phòng <1>{{roomName}}</1> để cùng làm việc trên tài liệu một cách an toàn.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "安全地共同编辑处理文档" (ānquán de gòngtóng biānjí chǔlǐ wéndàng) translates to 'safely co-edit and process documents'. A more natural and accurate translation for 'secure document collaboration' would be something like "用于安全协作处理文档" (yòng yú ānquán xiézuò chǔlǐ wéndàng) or "用于安全文档协作" (yòng yú ānquán wéndàng xiézuò).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 用于安全协作处理文档
